title: Mobile Arcade - Sound Effects
description: Now your Mobile Game will come to life!
longDescription:
Hello Developer!


In this Pack you will find more than 500 sound effects that were created thinking about mobile games, sounds like: Rewards, Whooshs, Swooshs, Combats, FootSteps, Transitions, Slides, Levers, Coins, among others. Even if the game you're making isn't for mobile, it's interesting to take a look at this package because I'm sure it can meet a number of needs.


Check the Preview

Check the Documentation


Quality

All sound effects were professionally and original made. Using Foley/Synthesizers techniques and virtual instruments you will have sounds that will surely pass the message on to the user and raise the bar of the quality level of your game.


Variety

To create this pack, a series of mobile games were analyzed and the most common sounds among them were those present in the library, but of course other sounds that can also come in handy are added, such as weapons, footsteps, and enemies .


Helping each other.

By investing in this package you are taking a series of great sound effects to your project and also encouraging me to create other libraries for developers, I hope you really like it, as this will motivate you to continue with your project, and it will motivate me to continue creating content .


Ease

The sounds created in this library are already ready, just import and use, I bring this as a facilitator for the development team, just put it in the project, implement it, and that's it!


Bonus

By investing in this package, you will also be taking the 'Retro game sounds' library with 141 retro sound effects for you to use!


License

non-exclusive license – you’re free to use these packs in your commercial games. No license to claim/resell as your own work.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 506

Number of Audio Cues: 506

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) The one that does contains 'loop' on the name

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Check the documentation here:

Important/Additional Notes: The cover image is a mix of free illustrations distributed for commercial use by pixabay from the artists: andremsantana, creozavr, Clker-Free-Vector-Images, OpenClipart-Vectors.
